clinical_study.brief_title: Post-Myocardial Infarction Patients in Santa Catarina, Brazil - Catarina Heart Study
clinical_study.official_title: Post-Myocardial Infarction Patients in Santa Catarina, Brazil: a Prospective Cohort Study - Catarina Heart Study

lead_sponsor.agency: Instituto de Cardiologia de Santa Catarina

clinical_study.source: Instituto de Cardiologia de Santa Catarina

brief_summary.textblock: Prospective cohort evaluating patients in the State of Santa Catarina (Brazil) with the diagnosis of the first acute myocardial infarction from July 2016 until December 2020.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Major cardiovascular events - MACE (cardiovascular death, nonfatal infarction, unstable angina or stroke) in 1 year
Major cardiovascular events - MACE (cardiovascular death, nonfatal infarction, unstable angina or stroke) in 30 days

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Epidemiological profile of hospitalized patients with infarction in Santa Catarina at the admission

secondary_outcome.description: Fish consumption at admission and its correlation with other evaluated parameters and its association with death, hospitalization, stroke, acute coronary syndromes and infarction
Read meat consumption at admission and its correlation with other evaluated parameters and its association with death, hospitalization, stroke, acute coronary syndromes and infarction
Red meat consumption at admission and its correlation with other evaluated parameters and its association with death, hospitalization, stroke, acute coronary syndromes and infarction
Caffeine consumption at admission and its correlation with other evaluated parameters and its association with death, hospitalization, stroke, acute coronary syndromes and infarction
Alcoholic beverages consumption at admission and its correlation with other evaluated parameters and its association with death, hospitalization, stroke, acute coronary syndromes and infarction
Illegal drugs consumption at admission and its correlation with other evaluated parameters and its association with death, hospitalization, stroke, acute coronary syndromes and infarction

Cognitive level (evaluated with Mini-Mental State Examination) at admission and its correlation with other evaluated parameters and its association with death, hospitalization, stroke, acute coronary syndromes and infarction syndromes and infarction

Religiosity (evaluated with Duke University Religion Index) at admission and its correlation with other evaluated parameters and its association with death, hospitalization, stroke, acute coronary syndromes and infarction

Pre-infarct (evaluated with Baecke Questionnaire) physical activity at admission and its correlation with other evaluated parameters and its association with death, hospitalization, stroke, acute coronary syndromes and infarction

Depression (evaluated with PHQ-9: Patient Health Questionnaire-9) at admission and its correlation with other evaluated parameters and its association with death, hospitalization, stroke, acute coronary syndromes and infarction
Syntax score at admission and its correlation with other evaluated parameters and its association with death, hospitalization, stroke, acute coronary syndromes and infarction

secondary_outcome.time_frame: TIMI frame count in patients with primary angioplasty at admission
secondary_outcome.description: TIMI frame count in patients with primary angioplasty at admission its correlation with other evaluated parameters and its association with death, hospitalization, stroke, acute coronary syndromes and infarction

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Ventricular function post-infarction (evaluated within 72 hours of admission)
secondary_outcome.description: Ventricular function (ventricular ejection fraction), its correlation with other evaluated parameters and its association with death, hospitalization, stroke, acute coronary syndromes and infarction

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Hematocrit and hemoglobin at the admission
Red Cell Distribution Width (RDW) at admission
Red Cell Distribution Width (RDW) in 72 hours

secondary_outcome.description: CHA2DS2-VASc Score, its correlation with other evaluated parameters and its association with death, hospitalization, stroke, acute coronary syndromes and infarction

intervention.description: Observational study of myocardial Infarction patients

study_pop.textblock: Consecutive patients attended at the Santa Catarina Institute of Cardiology and other hospitals in the State of Santa Catarina with the diagnosis of the first acute myocardial infarction
